name: StandupCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open Standup Countdown”
”Alexa, start Standup Countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: standup countdown
des: Want a fun way to get your team together for standup? Use this skill to start a countdown timer that lets your team know that they have 20 seconds to wrap up what they are doing and get up out of their seats for the daily meeting.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
